summary.span: 表示 Windows NT 性能计数器组件。

span.span: Represents a Windows NT performance counter component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组件可以用于读取现有预定义或自定义计数器和发布 （写入） 性能数据到自定义计数器。The component can be used for both reading existing predefined or custom counters and publishing (writing) performance data to custom counters. 有许多 Windows 性能监视器中列出的预定义的计数器[添加计数器对话框](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=257854)。There are numerous predefined counters listed in the Windows Performance Monitor's [Add Counters dialog box](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=257854). 若要了解有关.NET Framework 性能计数器，请参阅[性能计数器](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/performance-counters.md)。To learn about the .NET Framework performance counters, see [Performance Counters](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/performance-counters.md). 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在版本 1.0 和 1.1 版.NET Framework 中，此类要求直接调用方是完全受信任。In versions 1.0 and 1.1 of the .NET Framework, this class requires immediate callers to be fully trusted. 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，此类要求针对特定操作。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, this class requires for specific actions. 强烈建议不授予给不完全受信任的代码。It is strongly recommended that not be granted to semi-trusted code. 能够读取和写入性能计数器允许代码执行操作，例如枚举执行进程和获取有关它们的信息。The ability to read and write performance counters allows code to perform actions such as enumerating executing processes and obtaining information about them. > > 此外，传递不太受信任代码的对象可以创建一个安全问题。In addition, passing a object to less-trusted code can create a security issue. 决不要将传递性能计数器对象，如或到不太受信任的代码。Never pass performance counter objects, such as a or , to less trusted code. 若要读取从性能计数器，创建的实例类中，设置， ，以及 （可选）或属性，，然后调用方法才能性能计数器读取。To read from a performance counter, create an instance of the class, set the , , and, optionally, the or properties, and then call the method to take a performance counter reading. 若要发布性能计数器数据，创建一个或多个使用的自定义计数器方法，创建的实例类中，设置，和 （可选）或属性，然后调用， ，或方法，或者设置属性可以更改你的自定义计数器的值。To publish performance counter data, create one or more custom counters using the method, create an instance of the class, set the , and, optionally, or properties, and then call the , , or methods, or set the property to change the value of your custom counter. > [!NOTE] > ， ，和方法使用联锁更新计数器值。The , , and methods use interlocks to update the counter value. 这将有助于避免计数器值准确多线程或多进程方案，但是也导致对性能产生负面影响。This helps keep the counter value accurate in multithreaded or multiprocess scenarios, but also results in a performance penalty. 如果你不需要互锁的准确性操作提供，你可以更新属性直接为多达 5 倍的性能提高。If you do not need the accuracy that interlocked operations provide, you can update the property directly for up to a 5 times performance improvement. 但是，在多线程情况下，某些更新对计数器值可能会忽略，导致不准确的数据。However, in multithreaded scenarios, some updates to the counter value might be ignored, resulting in inaccurate data. 计数器是通过其上的性能收集数据的机制。The counter is the mechanism by which performance data is collected. 注册表存储的所有计数器，其中每个与相关的系统功能的特定区域的名称。The registry stores the names of all the counters, each of which is related to a specific area of system functionality. 示例包括一个处理器忙碌时间、 内存使用情况或通过网络连接接收的字节数。Examples include a processor's busy time, memory usage, or the number of bytes received over a network connection. 通过其名称和其位置唯一地标识每个计数器。Each counter is uniquely identified through its name and its location. 在文件路径包括驱动器、 目录、 一个或多个子目录和文件名称的方式相同，计数器信息包含以下四个元素： 计算机、 类别、 类别实例和计数器名称。In the same way that a file path includes a drive, a directory, one or more subdirectories, and a file name, counter information consists of four elements: the computer, the category, the category instance, and the counter name. 计数器信息必须包括类别中或性能对象，该计数器测量数据对象。The counter information must include the category, or performance object, that the counter measures data for. 计算机的类别包括物理组件，如处理器、 磁盘和内存。A computer's categories include physical components, such as processors, disks, and memory. 也有系统类别，如进程和线程。There are also system categories, such as processes and threads. 每个类别相关的功能元素在计算机中，有一组标准计数器分配给它。Each category is related to a functional element within the computer and has a set of standard counters assigned to it. 在 Windows 2000 的系统监视器中，添加计数器对话框的性能对象下拉列表中列出了这些对象，你必须将其包含的计数器路径中。These objects are listed in the Performance object drop-down list of the Add Counters dialog box within the Windows 2000 System Monitor, and you must include them in the counter path. 性能数据是按分组到类别与其相关。Performance data is grouped by the category to which is it related. 在某些情况下，可以存在的相同类别的多个副本。In certain cases, several copies of the same category can exist. 例如，几种进程和线程同时运行，而某些计算机包含多个处理器。For example, several processes and threads run simultaneously, and some computers contain more than one processor. 类别副本称为类别实例，并且每个实例都有一组分配给它的标准计数器。The category copies are called category instances, and each instance has a set of standard counters assigned to it. 如果某个类别可有多个实例，实例规范必须包含的计数器信息中。If a category can have more than one instance, an instance specification must be included in the counter information. 若要获取执行必要的计算所需的初始或以前的值的计数器的性能数据，请调用方法两次，并使用返回的信息，根据你的应用程序的需要。To obtain performance data for counters that required an initial or previous value for performing the necessary calculation, call the method twice and use the information returned as your application requires. > [!NOTE] > 使用安装的性能计数器类别[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]使用单独的共享的内存，每个性能计数器类别都有自己的内存。Performance counter categories installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] use separate shared memory, with each performance counter category having its own memory. 你可以通过创建 DWORD 注册表项 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services 中名为 FileMappingSize 指定单独的共享内存的大小\\*\<类别名称 >* \性能。You can specify the size of separate shared memory by creating a DWORD named FileMappingSize in the registry key HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\\*\* \Performance. FileMappingSize 值设置为该类别的共享的内存大小。The FileMappingSize value is set to the shared memory size of the category. 默认大小为十进制的 131072。The default size is 131072 decimal. 如果不存在，FileMappingSize 值`fileMappingSize`特性值`performanceCounters`使用 Machine.config 文件中指定的元素时，导致的配置文件处理的其他开销。If the FileMappingSize value is not present, the `fileMappingSize` attribute value for the `performanceCounters` element specified in the Machine.config file is used, causing additional overhead for configuration file processing. 您可以在注册表中设置的文件映射大小来实现应用程序启动时的性能改进。You can realize a performance improvement for application startup by setting the file mapping size in the registry. 有关文件映射大小的详细信息，请参阅[ <performanceCounters>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/performancecounters-element.md)。For more information about the file mapping size, see [<performanceCounters>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/performancecounters-element.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类创建和使用计数器类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to create and use an counter type. 上面的示例创建类别、 设置计数器，收集数据的计数器和调用从类来解释性能计数器数据。The example creates categories, sets up counters, collects data from the counters, and calls the class to interpret the performance counter data. 为中间和最终结果将显示在控制台窗口中。The intermediate and final results are displayed in the console window. 有关其他性能计数器类型的其他示例，请参阅枚举。For additional examples of other performance counter types, see the enumeration. [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/CPP/averagecount32.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/CS/averagecount32.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/VB/averagecount32.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载的构造函数集， ，和属性设置为空字符串 ("")，并将设置到本地计算机中，属性 ("。")。This overload of the constructor sets the , , and properties to empty strings (""), and sets the property to the local computer, ("."). 此构造函数不会初始化性能计数器，以便不将该实例关联与本地计算机上的现有计数器。This constructor does not initialize the performance counter, so it does not associate the instance with an existing counter on the local computer. 若要指向特定性能计数器，设置， ，以及 （可选）和之前读取任何其他属性或尝试从计数器读取的属性。To point to a specific performance counter, set the , , and, optionally, the and properties before reading any other properties or attempting to read from a counter. 若要写入的性能计数器，设置属性`false`。To write to a performance counter, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 应用于此成员的特性具有以下属性值： | 。The attribute applied to this member has the following property value: | . 不影响桌面应用程序（通常通过双击图标、键入命令或在浏览器中输入 URL 来启动这些应用程序）。The does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser). 有关详细信息，请参阅类或[SQL Server 编程和宿主保护特性](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md)。For more information, see the class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的默认实例类。The following code example creates a default instance of the class. 创建实例后， ， ，和属性值设置了，以及对的调用结果方法会显示。After the instance is created, the , , and property values are set, and the results of a call to the method are displayed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数字符串不区分大小写。The parameter strings are not case-sensitive. 此重载用于访问所属类别包含的单个性能计数器类别实例在本地计算机上的计数器。Use this overload to access a counter on the local computer that belongs to a category containing a single performance counter category instance. 如果你尝试使用此构造函数来指出这实例与包含多个实例，该构造函数引发异常的类别。If you attempt to use this constructor to point this instance to a category that contains multiple instances, the constructor throws an exception. 此重载可以访问任何只读或读/写计数器，但会在只读模式下。This overload can access any read-only or read/write counter, but does so in a read-only mode. A使用此重载创建的实例无法写入该计数器，即使该计数器本身是读/写。A instance created using this overload cannot write to the counter, even if the counter itself is read/write. 此重载的构造函数集和中传递的值的属性，设置到本地计算机中，属性"。"，并将设置属性为空字符串 ("")。This overload of the constructor sets the and properties to the values you pass in, sets the property to the local computer, ".", and sets the property to an empty string (""). 此构造函数初始化性能计数器，并将实例与本地计算机上的现有计数器 （系统或自定义计数器） 相关联。This constructor initializes the performance counter and associates the instance with an existing counter (either a system or a custom counter) on the local computer. 您为传递的值和属性必须指向本地计算机上的现有性能计数器。The values that you pass in for the and properties must point to an existing performance counter on the local computer. > [!NOTE] > 若要读取 Windows Vista、 Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中的性能计数器，你必须是 Performance Monitor Users 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免无需提升你的特权来访问在 Windows Vista 中的性能计数器，请将自己添加到 Performance Monitor Users 组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.

local computer that belongs to a category containing a single performance counter category instance. 如果你尝试使用此构造函数来指出这实例与包含多个实例，该构造函数引发异常的类别。If you attempt to use this constructor to point this instance to a category that contains multiple instances, the constructor throws an exception. 此重载的构造函数集， ，和中传递的值的属性，设置到本地计算机中，属性"。"，并将设置属性为空字符串 ("")。This overload of the constructor sets the , , and properties to the values you pass in, sets the property to the local computer, ".", and sets the property to an empty string (""). 此构造函数初始化性能计数器，并将实例与本地计算机上的现有计数器 （系统或自定义计数器） 相关联。This constructor initializes the performance counter and associates the instance with an existing counter (either a system or a custom counter) on the local computer. 您为传递的值和属性必须指向本地计算机上的现有性能计数器。The values that you pass in for the and properties must point to an existing performance counter on the local computer. 如果你指向的性能计数器实例不是有效的调用的构造函数引发异常。If the performance counter instance that you point to is not valid, calling the constructor throws an exception. > [!NOTE] > 你可以使用此重载以连接到系统计数器，但无法写入到系统计数器。You can use this overload to connect to a system counter, but you cannot write to a system counter. 因此，设置`readOnly`到`false`时连接到系统计数器引发构造函数引发异常。Therefore, setting `readOnly` to `false` when connecting to a system counter causes the constructor to throw an exception. > [!NOTE] > 若要读取 Windows Vista、 Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中的性能计数器，你必须是 Performance Monitor Users 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免无需提升你的特权来访问在 Windows Vista 中的性能计数器，请将自己添加到 Performance Monitor Users 组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的实例类。The following code example creates an instance of the class. 此示例传入类别名称、 计数器名称和标志值，该值指示计数器不只读的。The example passes in category names, counter names, and a flag value indicating that the remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数字符串不区分大小写。The parameter strings are not case-sensitive. 此重载的构造函数集， ，和属性的值传入，并设置到本地计算机中，属性"。"。This overload of the constructor sets the , , and properties to the values you pass in, and sets the property to the local computer, ".". 此构造函数初始化性能计数器，并将实例与本地计算机上的现有计数器 （系统或自定义计数器） 相关联。This constructor initializes the performance counter and associates the instance with an existing counter (either a system or a custom counter) on the local computer. 您为传递的值， ，和属性必须指向本地计算机上的现有性能计数器。The values that you pass in for the , , and properties must point to an existing performance counter on the local computer. 如果你指向的性能计数器实例不是有效的调用的构造函数引发异常。If the performance counter instance you point to is not valid, calling the constructor throws an exception. 此重载可以访问任何只读或读/写计数器，但会在只读模式下。This overload can access any read-only or read/write counter, but does so in a read-only mode. A使用此重载创建的实例无法写入该计数器，即使该计数器本身是读/写。A instance created using this overload cannot write to the counter, even if the counter itself is read/write. 若要创建的性能类别实例，指定`instanceName`上构造函数。To create a performance category instance, specify an `instanceName` on the constructor. 如果指定的类别实例`instanceName`已存在的新对象将引用现有的类别实例。If the category instance specified by `instanceName` already exists the new object will reference the existing category instance. > [!NOTE] > 若要读取 Windows Vista、 Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中的性能计数器，你必须是 Performance Monitor Users 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免无需提升你的特权来访问在 Windows Vista 中的性能计数器，请将自己添加到 Performance Monitor Users 组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.

A使用此重载创建的实例无法写入该计数器，即使该计数器本身是读/写。A instance created using this overload cannot write to the counter, even if the counter itself is read/write. > [!NOTE] > 无法写入远程性能计数器。You cannot write to remote performance counters. 没有任何重载均不允许你指定的读/写实例连接到远程计算机的类。There is no overload that allows you to specify a read/write instance of the class that connects to a remote computer. 若要创建的性能类别实例，指定`instanceName`上构造函数。To create a performance category instance, specify an `instanceName` on the constructor. 如果指定的类别实例`instanceName`已存在的新对象将引用现有的类别实例。If the category instance specified by `instanceName` already exists the new object will reference the existing category instance. > [!NOTE] > 若要读取 Windows Vista、 Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中的性能计数器，你必须是 Performance Monitor Users 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免无需提升你的特权来访问在 Windows Vista 中的性能计数器，请将自己添加到 Performance Monitor Users 组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Vista 中，当远程计算机为属于工作组中，你可能需要禁用 UAC，以便本地用户帐户未进行筛选，并可以将提升为管理员帐户。In Windows Vista, when the remote computer is a member of a workgroup, you may need to disable UAC so that the local user account is not filtered and can be elevated to an administrator account. 出于安全原因，禁用 UAC 应为最后一招。For security reasons, disabling UAC should be a last resort. 在禁用 UAC 的信息，请参阅[用户帐户控制和 WMI](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=91617)。For information on disabling UAC, see [User Account Control and WMI](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=91617).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中显示`Performance Object`字段的性能计数器管理器 MMC 管理单元中`Add Counter`对话框。The is displayed in the `Performance Object` field of Performance Counter Manager MMC snap in's `Add Counter` dialog box. 性能计数器监视类别中或计算机上的性能对象的行为。A performance counter monitors the behavior of a category, or performance object, on a computer. 类别包括物理组件 （如处理器、 磁盘和内存） 和系统对象 （如进程和线程）。Categories include physical components (such as processors, disks, and memory) and system objects (such as processes and threads). 与相同的性能对象相关的系统计数器都分组到类别，该值指示其常见的焦点。System counters that are related to the same performance object are grouped into a category that indicates their common focus. 当你创建的实例类，你首先指示该组件将进行交互，且然后从该类别中选择一个计数器的类别。When you create an instance of the class, you first indicate the category with which the component will interact, and then you choose a counter from that category. 例如，一个 Windows 计数器类别是内存类别。For example, one Windows counter category is the Memory category. 此类别中的系统计数器跟踪内存数据，如可用的字节数和缓存的字节数。System counters within this category track memory data such as the number of bytes available and the number of bytes cached. 如果你想要使用在你的应用程序中缓存的字节，则将创建的实例组件，将其连接到内存类别，然后挑选该类别中的相应计数器 （在此情况下，缓存字节）。If you wanted to work with the bytes cached in your application, you would create an instance of the component, connect it to the Memory category, and then pick the appropriate counter (in this case, Cached Bytes) from that category. 尽管你的系统可以使许多更多计数器类别可用，你将可能与之交互最频繁的类别将是缓存、 内存、 对象、 物理磁盘、 过程、 处理器、 服务器、 系统和线程类别。Although your system makes many more counter categories available, the categories that you will probably interact with most frequently are the Cache, Memory, Objects, PhysicalDisk, Process, Processor, Server, System, and Thread categories. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的默认实例类。The following code example creates a default instance of the class. 创建实例后， ， ，和属性值设置了，以及对的调用结果方法会显示。After the instance is created, the , , and property values are set, and the results of a call to the method are displayed. [!code-cpp[PerfCounter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerfCounter/CPP/perfcounter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PerfCounter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerfCounter/CS/perfcounter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PerfCounter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerfCounter/VB/perfcounter.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示性能计数器管理器 MMC 管理单元的添加计数器对话框当用户从计数器列表中选择一个计数器，并单击解释按钮的文本。The Add Counters dialog box of the Performance Counter Manager MMC snap in displays the text when a user selects a counter from the counters list and clicks the Explain button. 创建新的计数器，请使用文本以描述该计数器的监视器执行操作，以便用户可以确定是否将计数器添加到系统监视器的显示。When you create a new counter, use the text to describe what the counter monitors do so the user can determine whether to add the counter to the System Monitor's display. > [!NOTE] > 如果值属性是和性能计数器类别使用.NET Framework 版本 1.0 或 1.1 版中，创建引发。If the value for the property is and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an is thrown. 使用早期版本创建的性能计数器类别使用全局共享的内存，并且的值必须。Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for must be . 如果在版本 1.0 或 1.1 的.NET framework 上运行的应用程序不使用类别，删除并重新创建该类别。If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category. > [!NOTE] > 若要读取 Windows Vista、 Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中的性能计数器，你必须是 Performance Monitor Users 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免无需提升你的特权来访问在 Windows Vista 中的性能计数器，请将自己添加到 Performance Monitor Users 组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举包含性能计数器可与之交互的类型。The enumeration contains the types of performance counters that you can interact with. 某些计数器类型表示计算所得的值，如系统已进行的计数器度量值的平均值。Some of the counter types represent calculated values, such as the average of the counter measurements the system has taken. 其他类型表示原始，或非计算所得，值。Other types represent raw, or uncalculated, values. 下表显示将与最常交互的计数器类型。The following table shows the counter types that you will interact with most frequently. |计数器的责任Counter's Responsibility|PerformanceCounterType 值PerformanceCounterType Value|示例Example| |------------------------------|----------------------------------|-------------| |维护项或操作的简单的计数。Maintain a simple count of items or operations.|`NumberOfItems32`|跟踪收到作为 32 位整数的订单数。Tracking the number of orders received as a 32-bit integer.| |维护更高容量简单计数。Maintain a higher-capacity simple count.|`NumberOfItems64`|跟踪的订单量很大的站点的数量，存储为一个 64 位整数。Tracking the number of orders for a site with very high volume, stored as a 64-bit integer.| |跟踪项目或每秒的操作的数目。Track the number of items or operations per second.|`RateOfCountsPerSecond32`|在站点上每秒接收的跟踪订单。Tracking orders received per second on a site.| |跟踪项目或每秒操作数更高容量的数目。Track a higher-capacity number of items or operations per second.|`RateOfCountsPerSecond64`|跟踪订单上每秒钟接收非常高容量的站点。Tracking orders received per second on a site with very high volume.| |计算的平均时间来执行进程或处理项目Calculate the average time to perform a process or to process an item|`AverageTimer32`|计算一份订单所要处理的平均时间。Calculate the average time an order takes to be processed.| 在创建其类型需要使用相应的基本计数器的计数器时，您必须声明的计数器和中的基本则将传递给方法。When you create a counter whose type requires the use of a corresponding base counter, you must declare the counter and the base in the you pass into the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果值属性是和性能计数器类别使用.NET Framework 版本 1.0 或 1.1 版中，创建引发。If the value for the property is and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an is thrown. 使用早期版本创建的性能计数器类别使用全局共享的内存，并且的值必须。Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for must be . 如果在版本 1.0 或 1.1 的.NET framework 上运行的应用程序不使用类别，删除并重新创建该类别。If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category. > [!NOTE] > 若要读取 Windows Vista、 Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中的性能计数器，你必须是 Performance Monitor Users 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免无需提升你的特权来访问在 Windows Vista 中的性能计数器，请将自己添加到 Performance Monitor Users 组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以编写仅向自定义计数器。You can write only to custom counters. 所有系统计数器都是只读的。All system counters are read-only. > [!NOTE] > ， ，和方法使用联锁更新计数器值。The , , and methods use interlocks to update the counter value. 这将有助于避免计数器值准确多线程或多进程方案，但是也导致对性能产生负面影响。This helps keep the counter value accurate in multithreaded or multiprocess scenarios, but also results in a performance penalty. 如果你不需要互锁的准确性操作提供，你可以更新属性直接为多达 5 倍的性能提高。If you do not need the accuracy that interlocked operations provide, you can update the property directly for up to a 5 times performance improvement. 但是，在多线程情况下，某些更新对计数器值可能会忽略，导致不准确的数据。However, in multithreaded scenarios, some updates to the counter value might be ignored, resulting in inaccurate data. > [!NOTE] > 如果值属性是和性能计数器类别使用.NET Framework 版本 1.0 或 1.1 版中，创建引发。If the value for the property is and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an is thrown. 使用早期版本创建的性能计数器类别使用全局共享的内存，并且的值必须。Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for must be . 如果在版本 1.0 或 1.1 的.NET framework 上运行的应用程序不使用类别，删除并重新创建该类别。If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以编写仅向自定义计数器。You can write only to custom counters. 所有系统计数器都是只读的。All system counters are read-only. > [!NOTE] > ， ，和方法使用联锁更新计数器值。The , , and methods use interlocks to update the counter value. 这将有助于避免计数器值准确多线程或多进程方案，但是也导致对性能产生负面影响。This helps keep the counter value accurate in multithreaded or multiprocess scenarios, but also results in a performance penalty. 如果你不需要互锁的准确性操作提供，你可以更新属性直接为多达 5 倍的性能提高。If you do not need the accuracy that interlocked operations provide, you can update the property directly for up to a 5 times performance improvement. 但是，在多线程情况下，某些更新对计数器值可能会忽略，导致不准确的数据。However, in multithreaded scenarios, some updates to the counter value might be ignored, resulting in inaccurate data. > [!NOTE] > 如果值属性是和性能计数器类别使用.NET Framework 版本 1.0 或 1.1 版中，创建引发。If the value forthe property is and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an is thrown. 使用早期版本创建的性能计数器类别使用全局共享的内存，并且的值必须。Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for must be . 如果在版本 1.0 或 1.1 的.NET framework 上运行的应用程序不使用类别，删除并重新创建该类别。If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来向计数器递增。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to add increments to a counter. 此代码示例是一个更大的示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置此性能计数器的实例名称。

span.span: Gets or sets an instance name for this performance counter.

value.span: 性能计数器类别实例的名称，或者为空字符串 ("")（如果该计数器是单实例计数器）。

span.span: The name of the performance counter category instance, or an empty string (""), if the counter is a single-instance counter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 实例名称必须少于 128 个字符的长度。Instance names must be shorter than 128 characters in length. 在某些情况下，类别分为实例，跟踪有关类别相关的对象的多个匹配项的数据。In some situations, categories are subdivided into instances, which track data about multiple occurrences of the object that a category relates to. 实例应用于整个类别，而不是各个计数器。Instances apply to the category as whole, rather than to individual counters. 在类别中的每个计数器都有该类别定义的每个实例。Every counter within a category has each instance defined for the category. 例如，进程类别包含名为空闲和系统的实例。For example, the Process category contains instances named Idle and System. 进程类别中的每个计数器因此包含每个实例，其中显示了有关空闲的进程或系统进程的信息的数据。Every counter within the Process category thus contains data for each instance, showing information about either idle processes or system processes. 许多类别不包含多个实例，因此，你可以将此属性为空，指示没有实例都与类别关联。Many categories do not contain multiple instances, so you can leave this property empty to indicate that no instance is associated with the category. 如果此实例指向非自定义类别中，你可以选择从仅对现有的类别实例。If this instance points to a noncustom category, you can choose from only the existing category instances. 你可以仅在自定义的类别，可用于定义为多个计数器和类别需要实例中创建新类别实例。You can create new category instances only in custom categories, which allow you to define as many counters and category instances as you need. 若要创建的性能类别实例，指定`instanceName`上构造函数。To create a performance category instance, specify an `instanceName` on the constructor. 如果指定的类别实例`instanceName`已存在的新对象将引用现有的类别实例。If the category instance specified by `instanceName` already exists the new object will reference the existing category instance. > [!NOTE] > 不使用字符"（"，"）"，"#"、"\\"，或"/"中的实例名称。Do not use the characters "(", ")", "#", "\\", or "/" in the instance name. 如果使用上述任一字符，则性能控制台 (请参阅[运行时分析](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/runtime-profiling.md)) 可能无法正确显示实例值。If any of these characters are used, the Performance Console (see [Runtime Profiling](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/runtime-profiling.md)) may not correctly display the instance values. 如果实例名称自动生成的并且可能包含字符"（"，"）"，"#"、"\\"，或"/"，使用下表中的字符映射。If the instance name is automatically generated and might contain the characters "(", ")", "#", "\\", or "/", use the character mapping in the following table. |字符Character|映射的字符Mapped character| |---------------|----------------------| |((|[[| |))|]]| |#|__| |\|_\|_| |/|__| 属性获取从对象属性是实例名称可包含无效字符的一个常见原因。The property of the object obtained from the property is a common source of instance names that can contain invalid characters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的默认实例类。The following code example creates a default instance of the class. 创建实例后， ， ，和属性值设置了，以及对的调用结果方法会显示。After the instance is created, the , , and property values are set, and the results of a call to the method are displayed. [!code-cpp[PerfCounter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerfCounter/CPP/perfcounter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PerfCounter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerfCounter/CS/perfcounter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PerfCounter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerfCounter/VB/perfcounter.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以在本地计算机上写入仅对驻留的计数器的值。You can write values only to counters that reside on the local computer. 但是，你可以读取计数器值从为其企业中的任何计算机具有访问权限。However, you can read counter values from any computer in the enterprise for which you have access privileges. 当你将设置属性以指向远程计算机，实例会尝试打开该计算机上的计数器。When you set the property to point to a remote computer, the instance attempts to open the counter on that computer. 如果计数器不存在，则设置此属性将引发异常。If the counter does not exist, setting this property throws an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通常用于包含非计算所得的值的计数器。This method is generally used for counters that contain uncalculated values. > [!NOTE] > 如果值属性是和性能计数器类别使用.NET Framework 版本 1.0 或 1.1 版中，创建引发。If the value for the property is and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an is thrown. 使用早期版本创建的性能计数器类别使用全局共享的内存，并且的值必须。Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for must be . 如果在版本 1.0 或 1.1 的.NET framework 上运行的应用程序不使用类别，删除并重新创建该类别。If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category. > [!NOTE] > 若要读取 Windows Vista、 Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中的性能计数器，你必须是 Performance Monitor Users 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免无需提升你的特权来访问在 Windows Vista 中的性能计数器，请将自己添加到 Performance Monitor Users 组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来获取计数器的下一个非计算所得的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to obtain the next uncalculated value of a counter. 此代码示例是一个更大的示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example for the class. [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/CPP/averagecount32.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/CS/averagecount32.cs#3)] [!code-vb[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/VB/averagecount32.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果计数器的计算的值取决于两个计数器读取，第一次读取的操作返回 0.0。If the calculated value of a counter depends on two counter reads, the first read operation returns 0.0. 重置要指定不同的计数器的性能计数器属性等效于创建新的性能计数器，并使用新的属性的第一个读取的操作返回 0.0。Resetting the performance counter properties to specify a different counter is equivalent to creating a new performance counter, and the first read operation using the new properties returns 0.0. 对的调用之间的建议的延迟时间方法为 1 秒，以允许要执行的下一个增量读的计数器。The recommended delay time between calls to the method is one second, to allow the counter to perform the next incremental read. > [!NOTE] > 若要读取性能计数器，你必须具有管理权限。To read performance counters, you must have administrative privileges. 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建计数器，然后使用方法以显示一段时间的计数器的值。The following code example creates an counter and uses the method to display the counter's values over a time period. [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime/CPP/elapsedtime.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime/CS/elapsedtime.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime/VB/elapsedtime.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果计数器类型为 32 位大小，并且你尝试将此属性设置为太大，无法安装一个值，该属性会截断到 32 位的值。If the counter type is a 32-bit size and you attempt to set this property to a value that is too large to fit, the property truncates the value to 32 bits. 在读取本地计算机上的自定义计数器时，使用属性，而不是计算得出的值可以产生显著提高性能的足够的原始值的情况。When reading custom counters on the local computer, using the property rather than a calculated value can produce significantly better performance in scenarios where the raw value is sufficient. 如果你正在阅读的计数器是只读的则获取属性的属性称为次采样的计数器。If the counter that you are reading is read-only, getting the property samples the counter at the time that the property is called. 此操作等效于初始调用方法。This action is equivalent to making an initial call to the method. 如果您随后调用，你可以对两个调用返回的值执行计算。If you subsequently call , you can perform calculations on the values that both calls returned. 由于系统计数器是只读的您可以获取但未设置其原始值。Because system counters are read-only, you can get but not set their raw values. > [!NOTE] > ， ，和方法使用联锁更新计数器值。The , , and methods use interlocks to update the counter value. 这将有助于避免计数器值准确多线程或多进程方案，但是也导致对性能产生负面影响。This helps keep the counter value accurate in multithreaded or multiprocess scenarios, but also results in a performance penalty. 如果你不需要互锁的准确性操作提供，你可以更新属性直接为多达 5 倍的性能提高。If you do not need the accuracy that interlocked operations provide, you can update the property directly for up to a 5 times performance improvement. 但是，在多线程情况下，某些更新对计数器值可能会忽略，导致不准确的数据。However, in multithreaded scenarios, some updates to the counter value might be ignored, resulting in inaccurate data. > [!NOTE] > 如果值属性是和性能计数器类别使用.NET Framework 版本 1.0 或 1.1 版中，创建引发。If the value for the property is and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an is thrown. 使用早期版本创建的性能计数器类别使用全局共享的内存，并且的值必须。Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for must be . 如果在版本 1.0 或 1.1 的.NET framework 上运行的应用程序不使用类别，删除并重新创建该类别。If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category. > [!NOTE] > 若要读取 Windows Vista、 Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中的性能计数器，你必须是 Performance Monitor Users 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免无需提升你的特权来访问在 Windows Vista 中的性能计数器，请将自己添加到 Performance Monitor Users 组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples summary.span: 删除由 对象的 属性指定的类别实例。

span.span: Deletes the category instance specified by the object property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以删除仅用于自定义计数器实例。You can remove an instance only for a custom counter. 所有系统计数器都是只读的因此在尝试删除其中一个将引发异常。All system counters are read-only, so attempting to remove one of them throws an exception. > [!NOTE] > 若要避免可能的争用情况，在释放性能计数器共享内存时，建议方法调用从事件处理程序。To avoid a possible race condition when the performance counter shared memory is released, it is recommended that the method be called from the event handler. 若要创建的性能类别实例，指定`instanceName`上构造函数。To create a performance category instance, specify an `instanceName` on the constructor. 如果指定的类别实例`instanceName`已存在的新对象将引用现有的类别实例。If the category instance specified by `instanceName` already exists the new object will reference the existing category instance. > [!NOTE] > 如果值属性是和性能计数器类别使用.NET Framework 版本 1.0 或 1.1 版中，创建引发。If the value for the property is and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an is thrown. 使用早期版本创建的性能计数器类别使用全局共享的内存，并且的值必须。Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for must be . 如果在版本 1.0 或 1.1 的.NET framework 上运行的应用程序不使用类别，删除并重新创建该类别。If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category.
